AI Agents for Real Estate

For real estate agents, managing listings, responding to customer enquiries, and following up with leads can feel like too much work. That's where Deligence Technologies comes in. We build AI Agents that take care of the repetitive work, respond instantly to enquiries, and keep your clients engaged 24/7. We are here to free up your time so you can focus on growing your business, as we use AI to take care of the rest.

Book A Free Consultation

Our Real Estate AI Agents

Being a real estate agent requires multitasking. While working to close deals, you're taking client calls, updating documentation, sending messages with property details, scheduling viewings, establishing contracts and communicating with leads. The problem? Most of these tasks are easy and take up valuable time that might have been spent with customers.

Our Real Estate AI Agents help you save time by managing leads, reducing the administrative burden, and keeping your clients connected instantly.

Real Estate Lead Intake Automation

Managing the client journey in real estate, from capturing a new lead to closing a deal, can often be time-consuming and costly. Agents frequently spend hours manually entering data, sending paperwork, and following up on payments, which can slow down the entire process and impact client satisfaction.

Firstly, our automation system captures leads instantly using simple, branded forms. Whether it's a buyer, seller, or investor, all submitted information is automatically collected, ensuring no potential client is missed.

Secondly, the client details are synced directly into Google Sheets or Airtable, creating a centralized hub for all your data. This acts as your CRM, allowing your team to access and manage client information efficiently without the need for repeated manual entry.

Next, property listings are sent automatically to clients in a professional and trackable format. This ensures clients receive timely updates about relevant properties, while you can monitor which listings are being viewed or clicked.

After that, contracts are generated automatically and sent for digital signatures online. By integrating tools like PandaDoc or DocuSign, the system fills in client information, collects signatures, and stores the signed documents securely.

Then, clients can schedule property viewings or consultations themselves using Calendly, integrated seamlessly with your calendar. By doing this, agents and clients can save a large amount of time by avoiding exchanges of emails or phone calls

Additionally, payments such as deposits or service fees are processed safely and efficiently through Stripe, keeping transactions smooth and secure.

Finally, all documents, including contracts, property files and client uploads, are stored in Google Drive in an organised manner. This ensures everything is easily accessible, well-structured, and protected.

With the help of AI Agents for Real Estate, teams can automate lead management, communication, and routine tasks. This means quicker operations, fewer errors, and more rapid reactions. The entire experience of clients improves, while agencies benefit from lower costs and simpler business growth.

Benefits of Lead Intake Automation

Faster Response

Quickly captures and responds to leads, so you never miss an opportunity and can engage prospects at the right time.

No Manual Data Entry

Automatically records lead details, reducing errors, saving time, and keeping information well-organised.

Simple, Professional Forms

Offers easy-to-fill, branded forms that give potential clients a smooth and trustworthy experience.

Scalable Solution

Adapts as your business grows, managing more leads efficiently without losing accuracy or speed.

Watch Demo

AI Copilot for Real Estate Agents

Real estate agents often spend 1520 hours per week on administrative tasks such as updating CRMs, logging appointments, and setting reminders. This reduces the time available for client-facing work and slows down deal closures.

Firstly, the copilot integrates simply into your existing workflow using familiar communication channels like SMS and voice memos. Agents can simply text or speak naturally, and AI Copilot understands the input.

Secondly, Copilot extracts all the important information from your messages, including client contacts, appointments, and tasks. This ensures nothing is missed, even when handling multiple clients at once.

Next, the AI automatically updates your CRM (starting with Follow Up Boss) with all collected information. This eliminates the need for repetitive manual entry, keeping your data accurate and up to date.

After that, Copilot organises your tasks and sends smart reminders for upcoming meetings or follow-ups. This way, you never miss a deadline or opportunity to engage with a client.

By automating everyday tasks, AI for real estate agents like AI Copilot ensures you spend less time on paperwork and more time on meaningful client interactions. This balance helps you work smarter, improve efficiency, and close more deals with ease.

Benefits of AI Copilot for Real Estate Agents

Save Valuable Time

With AI Copilot handling repetitive tasks like scheduling and follow-ups, real estate agents can free up hours each week to focus on what truly drives results.

Focus on What Matters

Instead of getting caught up in paperwork, agents can spend more time with clients, showing properties, and closing deals that grow their business.

Simple and Natural to Use

AI Copilot feels more like a helpful assistant than a tool. It's intuitive, easy to use, and doesn't require any complicated setup or training.

Stay Organised

From managing leads to keeping track of property details, AI Copilot helps agents stay on top of everything, reducing stress and ensuring nothing important is overlooked.

Watch Demo

AI Voice Agents

Answering or making calls and qualifying leads is essential, but agents cannot be available 24/7. Missed calls often mean missed opportunities and lost revenue. That's why we have created this AI Voice Agent.

Firstly, the AI Voice Agent answers incoming calls or makes outgoing calls (if a database is provided) automatically at any time, day or night, ensuring no lead goes unanswered. We can even schedule a time to make calls.

Secondly, it engages callers in natural, human-like conversations using advanced AI tools like Retell AI and ElevenLabs. This allows the agent to collect crucial information while sounding professional and approachable.

Next, the AI qualifies leads by asking relevant questions, determining their level of interest, and capturing their details. This ensures that only high-quality leads are forwarded to your team.

After that, IT integrates with your CRM and other business systems via API, automatically logging call details, updating client records, and even booking appointments.

Finally, the AI can handle multiple calls simultaneously, scale with your business needs, and ensure that every client receives attention without requiring additional staff. This increases lead conversion, reduces operational costs and improves the overall client experience.

Benefits of AI Voice Agent

24/7 Availability

It stays active around the clock, so customers always get support without delays or missed calls.

Natural Conversations

Communicates in a human-like way, making interactions smoother and more engaging.

Handles Multiple Clients

Can manage several calls at once, reducing wait times and improving overall efficiency.

Seamless Integration

Easily fits into your existing tools and systems, keeping workflows simple and hassle-free.

Watch Demo

People Want to Know

Frequently Asked Questions

What is a real estate AI agent?

An AI agent is a smart digital assistant that automates lead handling, property recommendations, scheduling, and client interactions for real estate professionals.

Can AI agents work with my existing CRM?

Yes, our AI agents integrate seamlessly with the most popular CRMs and property management systems.

Will AI replace real estate agents?

No, AI agents assist realtors by handling repetitive tasks, allowing professionals to focus on building relationships and closing deals.

Is it suitable for small real estate businesses?

Absolutely! Our AI agents are scalable and can be customized to fit businesses of all sizes.

How quickly can I see results?

Most clients start seeing improved lead engagement and faster conversions within the first few weeks of using our AI solutions.

Can AI agents communicate in multiple languages?

Yes, our AI agents support multiple languages to cater to diverse customer bases.

Do you provide ongoing support?

Yes, our team offers continuous support, updates, and training to ensure your AI agent performs at its best.
